@@ -83,0 +83,13 @@
+/**
+ * Invokes CALL in a loop, setting RET to return value.
+ * Invokes PREDICATE for condition to restart CALL (in loop)
+ * Return RET otherwise
+ */
+#define NET_RESTARTABLE(RET,CALL,PREDICATE)     \
+    while (1) {                                 \
+        RET = CALL;                             \
+        if (!(PREDICATE)) {                     \
+            break;                              \
+        }                                       \
+    }
+
